boardgame.name: Niet!
Njet!
Nyet!
否決權！
boardgame.description: In each opening round of the trick-taking card game Nyet!, players take turns crossing out possible choices for starting player, trump, super trump, the number of cards you discard, and the value of tricks taken on a grid, leaving only one option in each category. Once the starting player is determined, that player chooses a partner, then the teams play out the round based on the conditions they collectively chose._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamepodcastepisode: Cult of the New Board Game Podcast 004 – Essen 2015 Diary!

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

listing.notes: This game was a preorder.
Tough to find these days especially in this condition. Game is still in shrinkwrap. Shipping at actual cost dependend on destination, total weight and method of shipment chosen.
Will ship worldwide for cost.

+++ new and in shrink +++ Shipping is EUR 4.00 within Europe or EUR 7.00 worldwide. The delivery time varies from 1 to 4 weeks. I can offer even more games upon request. Please also check listings of my friend montsegur - combined regular shipping is possible. For more details on my USA and Canada special shipping offer please click robbirob and then the more info button.

Njet! (Goldsieber), 0,2 Kg Condition/Zustand: new, unused and sealed, apart from a very minor damage on the box still very good condition / neu, unbenutzt und in Folie verpackt. Die Schachtel hat eine minimale Delle! General Information: I sell this item as a private seller. I can not give any guarantees or refunds. Nevertheless as a board game collector I describe the item as accurate as possible. In case of missing tiles or damages I mention this in the item description. Diesen Artikel verkaufe ich als Privatperson. Eine Garantie oder eine Ruecknahme biete ich nicht an. Als Sammler von Brettspielen achte ich jedoch sehr genau auf den Zustand und auf die Vollzaehligkeit. Die Spiele sind daher meistens tadellos erhalten. Sollten Maengel vorhanden sein, werden diese auch in der Beschreibung unter _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Condition/Zustand_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; erwaehnt.
